name: Trader Joe's Blanched Almond Flour, Extra Fine Ground, 16 oz (1 lb), Gluten Free
short_description: PREMIUM QUALITY: Extra fine ground blanched California almonds, carefully processed to remove brown skins for optimal texture and flavor in baking
GLUTEN-FREE: Perfect alternative to regular flour for baking goods, breading, or as a breadcrumb substitute in recipes
VERSATILE USE: Ideal for making cookies, meatballs, and other baked goods while adding rich, moist texture and subtle nutty flavor
STORAGE: Recommended to store in refrigerator or freezer after opening for maximum shelf life; bring to room temperature before use
NUTRITIONAL VALUE: Contains 190 calories per 1/4 cup serving, with 7g protein and only 6g total carbohydrates, making it suitable for various dietary needs
product_description: Discover Trader Joe's Blanched Almond Flour, a versatile gluten-free alternative crafted from premium California almonds. Each 16-ounce bag contains finely ground blanched almonds, processed to remove the brown skins and milled to an extra-fine consistency that's perfect for baking. This flour offers a subtle, nutty flavor and adds wonderful moisture to your recipes. It's ideal for various culinary applications - use it in baked goods, as a breading for chicken or fish, or even as a replacement for breadcrumbs in meatballs. Each serving (1/4 cup) contains 190 calories and provides a protein-rich option for your baking needs. For optimal freshness and extended shelf life, store in the refrigerator or freezer after opening, and bring to room temperature before use. The package even includes a bonus recipe for Unbelievable Chocolate Chip Cookies, making it easy to start your gluten-free baking journey. Perfect for both novice bakers and culinary enthusiasts looking to explore alternative flour options.

name: Almond Flour – 3 lbs Bag, Blanched Superfine, Gluten Free, Kosher Certified, 6g Protein, 3g Fiber, 0g Added Sugar, 0mg Sodium, 0mg Cholesterol, 19g Monounsaturated Fat, 9g Polyunsaturated Fat, Product of California, Low Carb Baking Essential
short_description: 🌰 Blanched superfine almond flour – Smooth and light texture, perfect for bread, cookies, cakes, pancakes, and keto-friendly recipes. 💪 6g of protein per serving – Adds plant-based protein for lasting energy and satiety throughout the day. 🌱 3g fiber, 0g added sugar, 0mg sodium, 0mg cholesterol – A clean, nutrient-dense choice for low-carb, paleo, and wellness-focused diets. 💚 19g monounsaturated fat + 9g polyunsaturated fat – Heart-healthy fats that help support good cholesterol, brain function, and cardiovascular wellness.

🚫 Gluten free and Kosher certified – Prepared under strict standards, ensuring quality and peace of mind for diverse lifestyles. 📦 3 lbs resealable bag – Convenient bulk size, keeps the flour fresh and ready for daily cooking and baking. 🇺🇸 Product of California – Made with premium blanched almonds, naturally rich in calcium, iron, and essential nutrients.
product_description: Enhance your recipes with this Almond Flour – 3 lbs Blanched Superfine. Made from premium California almonds, it provides a smooth texture perfect for breads, cookies, cakes, pancakes, and keto-friendly baking. Each serving delivers 6g of protein, 3g of fiber, and is completely sugar free, sodium free, and cholesterol free. In addition, it provides 19g of monounsaturated fat and 9g of polyunsaturated fat — heart-healthy fats known to support cardiovascular health, brain function, and balanced cholesterol. Certified Kosher and gluten free, this almond flour fits perfectly into low-carb, paleo, and keto lifestyles. Packed in a resealable 3 lbs bag, it ensures freshness, convenience, and value for health-conscious kitchens.

name: Almonds, Extra fine Fresh Flour/Meal healthy Blanched Raw, Keto friendly, Quality, Delicious, #1 Diet, Low Carb, Protein, Packed in a 1 lb. (16 oz.) resealable bag by Presto Sales LLC
short_description: 100% PURE: Our fine almond flour / meal / powder / ground is carefully prepared with our customers in mind. Our EXRTA FINE flour is made purely of almonds with no artificial ingredients added and will enhance your goodies immensely. We provide you with a fantastic option making it easy for those on restrictive diets, great for your favorite keto pizza crust

IMPRESSIVE: This remarkable low carb flour is terrific in the kitchen. Can be used for savory and sweet dishes. Use it in your muffins, tortillas, cookies, breads, waffles, energy bars and more. Use it when breading fish or chicken and in your meatballs or meatloaf. The amazing sweet nutty taste and texture of this flour will add an unbelievable dimension to your recipes; substitute for almond milk, casavana, cashew, konjac, paleo, green banana, coconut, lupin, plantain, and cauliflower flours

IN GOOD SHAPE: Our blanched almond flour (as called harina de almendras) has a low-carb content and contains healthy fats, proteins, and fiber, making it a great addition to your way of life and family meals. Almond flour is also a good source of monounsaturated fats which can assist your cholesterol levels.
PERFECT FOR ALL: This plan-based protein is Keto, Non-GMO, Vegan and Paleo friendly. It is also a low glycemic index food. Therefore, this flour is great for all family and friends, cup 4 cup flour
OUR SERVICE: Presto Sales LLC is proud to bring you fresh top-quality flour. We provide our flour in resealable bags for your easy storage and usage; try it in all your baking needs

name: Nature's Eats Blanched Almond Flour, 64 Ounce
product_description: Nature’s Eats Blanched Almond Flour is the perfect alternative to traditional flour for those living a gluten free, keto, paleo, or low carb lifestyle. Made from finely ground, skinless California almonds, this superfine almond meal delivers a light texture and mild flavor that works beautifully in baking and cooking. Use it in everything from pancakes and muffins to savory breads and pizza crusts. With no grains, no gluten, and no fillers, this almond flour is a clean, nutrient-dense choice packed with plant-based protein, fiber, and healthy fats. The 64 oz resealable bulk bag is ideal for regular baking and long-term storage. Read more
